{{cpp/experimental/title|n=simd_abi::|max_fixed_size}}
{{cpp/experimental/simd/navbar}}

{{ddcl|header=experimental/simd|since=parallelism_ts_2|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
constexpr int max_fixed_size = /*implementation-defined*/;
}}

The value of {{c|max_fixed_size&lt;T&gt;}} declares that an instance of {{c|simd&lt;T, fixed_size&lt;N&gt;&gt;}} with {{c|1=N &lt;= max_fixed_size&lt;T&gt;}} is supported by the implementation. The value of {{c|max_fixed_size&lt;T&gt;}} is at least {{c|32}}.

===Notes===
It is unspecified whether an implementation supports {{c|simd&lt;T, fixed_size&lt;N&gt;&gt;}} with {{c|N &gt; max_fixed_size&lt;T&gt;}}. The value of {{c|max_fixed_size&lt;T&gt;}} may depend on compiler flags and may change between different compiler versions.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cstdint&gt;
#include &lt;experimental/simd&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
namespace stq = std::experimental;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; stq::simd_abi::max_fixed_size&lt;std::uint8_t&gt; &lt;&lt; ' ';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; stq::simd_abi::max_fixed_size&lt;std::uint64_t&gt; &lt;&lt; ' ';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; stq::simd_abi::max_fixed_size&lt;float&gt; &lt;&lt; ' ';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; stq::simd_abi::max_fixed_size&lt;long double&gt; &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
32 32 32 32
}}
